abilities.name: Pulse Strike
abilities.effect: 1d4 + STR; on hit gain +1 to next melee roll this round; gain +1 Momentum if you currently have 0 Momentum.

abilities.name: Stoneguard Step
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d4; if reduced to 0, ignore –1 chain penalty on your next attack; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Stonepulse Rhythm
abilities.effect: Ally in Near gains +1 Attack on next hit; you gain +1 RP; grant +1 Momentum to ally.

abilities.name: Stonepulse Step
abilities.effect: Set Balance to 0; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Resonant Break
abilities.effect: 1d6 + STR; apply Stagger 1; if in Stonepulse Stance, gain +1 RP; gain +1 Momentum if target is Staggered.

abilities.name: Anchored Form
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d6; if reduced to 0 gain Retaliate; stance grants Defense Up; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Stonepulse Focus
abilities.effect: Gain Attack Up + Defense Up; allies in Near gain +1 IDF; you gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Stonepulse Stance
abilities.effect: Enter stance: +1 Defense and +1 IDF until replaced; gain +1 Momentum at start of your turn.

abilities.name: Sundering Crash
abilities.effect: 1d8 + STR; apply Stagger 1; if target already Staggered, apply Vulnerable 1; if Momentum ≥ 2, deal +2 bonus dmg.

abilities.name: Steelguard Pivot
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d8; if reduced to 0, your next attack deals +2 dmg; if Momentum ≥ 2, that attack has Advantage.

abilities.name: Law of the Unshaken
abilities.effect: Your next melee attack has Advantage and +3 dmg; if in stance, also apply Stagger 1; if Momentum ≥ 2, deal +5 dmg instead.

abilities.name: Stonepulse Advance
abilities.effect: Remove the cooldown from one Tier 1 or Tier 2 Stonepulse ability; set Balance to 0; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Gleam Strike
abilities.effect: 1d4 + WIS radiant at Near range; if you have Radiance ≥ 1, gain +1 Momentum on hit.

abilities.name: Oathbound Guard
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d4; grant +1 Defense until next turn; gain +1 Momentum when dmg is reduced.

abilities.name: Hymn of Embers
abilities.effect: Next ally attack deals +1 radiant; gain 1 Radiance; gain +1 Momentum when Radiance is gained.

abilities.name: Radiant Glide
abilities.effect: Gain 1 Radiance; if you had 0 Radiance before, gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Searing Canticle
abilities.effect: 1d6 + WIS radiant; +1 dmg if target harmed an ally last round; if that condition is met, gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Sanctus Aegis
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d6; you and a Near ally gain +1 IDF; you and that ally each gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Chorus of Resolve
abilities.effect: Ally gains 1 RP and +1 Attack; remove Exhausted; that ally gains +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Canticle Stance
abilities.effect: Enter stance: gain 1 Radiance and +1 Momentum at start of your turn.

abilities.name: Judgment Lance
abilities.effect: 1d8 + WIS radiant; if Radiance ≥ 1, deal +2 dmg and consume 1 Radiance; if Momentum ≥ 2, deal +2 additional dmg (total +4).

abilities.name: Warding Reprisal
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d8; attacker takes radiant dmg equal to Radiance; if Momentum ≥ 2, attacker instead takes dmg equal to 2× your Radiance.

abilities.name: Radiant Burst
abilities.effect: Consume all Radiance: primary target takes 1d8 + WIS + 2/stack; others take 1/stack; if Momentum ≥ 2, others take 2/stack instead.

abilities.name: Sanctified Stride
abilities.effect: Remove cooldown from one Tier 1 or Tier 2 Canticle ability; gain 1 Radiance; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Cutpoint Slice
abilities.effect: 1d4 + DEX; apply Bleed 1; if target was already Bleeding, gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Veil Step
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d4; if avoided, apply Bleed 1 to attacker and gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Wound Mark
abilities.effect: Your next Bleed application gains +1 Bleed; gain +1 Momentum when that enhanced Bleed is applied.

abilities.name: Blood Slip
abilities.effect: Reduce Balance penalty by 2; if you applied Bleed this round, gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Artery Rupture
abilities.effect: 1d6 + DEX; apply Bleed 2; if target is already Bleeding, also apply Stagger 1; gain up to +2 Momentum based on Bleed stacks applied.

abilities.name: Veinshift Evade
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d6; if avoided, become Invisible; next attack applies +1 Bleed; if this was a Perfect Dodge, gain +2 Momentum.

abilities.name: Bloodletting Focus
abilities.effect: Your next two Bleed applications each gain +1 Bleed; gain +1 Momentum immediately.

abilities.name: Bloodveil Stance
abilities.effect: Bleed you inflict deals +1 dmg/round; +1 DEX to hit Bleeding targets; gain +1 Momentum whenever a Bleed you caused deals damage (max +1/round).

abilities.name: Hemorrhage Breaker
abilities.effect: 1d8 + DEX; if Bleed ≥ 3, deal +4 dmg and consume stacks for +1 dmg/stack; if Momentum ≥ 2, each consumed stack grants +2 dmg instead.

abilities.name: Bloodfade Veil
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d8; become Invisible; next attack deals +2 dmg per Bleed; if Momentum ≥ 2, that attack deals +3 dmg per Bleed instead.

abilities.name: Crimson Dictate
abilities.effect: All Bleeding enemies gain +2 Bleed; next Bleed spreads to second target; if Momentum ≥ 2, spreads to a third target.

abilities.name: Sanguine Dash
abilities.effect: Remove cooldown from one Tier 1 or Tier 2 Hemocratic ability; if any enemy is Bleeding, gain +2 Momentum; reduce Balance penalty by 3.

abilities.name: Charge Bolt
abilities.effect: 1d4 + INT lightning; +1 dmg if you spent RP last action; if you spent RP last action, also gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Warding Pulse
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d4; attacker takes 1 lightning dmg; if dmg is reduced to 0, gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Arcane Channel
abilities.effect: Next spell gains +1 to hit; gain +1 RP; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Arcane Step
abilities.effect: Gain Arcane Ward 1 (reduce next incoming dmg by 1); if you cast a spell this round, Arcane Ward becomes 2; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Surge Lance
abilities.effect: 1d6 + INT lightning; on hit gain Arcane Charge (+1 dmg next spell); gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Feedback Shield
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d6; if reduced to 0, attacker takes INT dmg; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Conduit Flow
abilities.effect: +1 INT for 1 round; next spell gains +2 dmg; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Conduit Stance
abilities.effect: +1 Arcane IDF; refresh 1 Magic Pool per round; gain +1 Momentum whenever you cast a spell (max +1/round).

abilities.name: Law of the Stormcore
abilities.effect: 1d8 + INT; on hit, chain a free 1d4 lightning bolt to another target; if Momentum ≥ 2, bolt deals 1d6.

abilities.name: Aetheric Reversal
abilities.effect: Reduce dmg by 1d8; attacker becomes Disrupted (–2 spell rolls); if Momentum ≥ 2, Disrupted becomes –3.

abilities.name: Arcanum Overload
abilities.effect: Next spell has Advantage and +3 dmg; you take 1 self-dmg; if Momentum ≥ 2, this becomes +5 dmg.

abilities.name: Arcane Transcendence
abilities.effect: Remove cooldown from one Tier 1 or Tier 2 Arcanum ability; gain Arcane Ward 2; gain +1 Momentum.

abilities.name: Disengage
abilities.effect: End your current chain immediately. No further actions may be taken this chain.

abilities.name: Rhythm Break
abilities.effect: Cancel an Interrupt attempt before the contest is rolled.

abilities.name: Momentum Anchor
abilities.effect: Gain +1 Momentum. May not be used after damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Balance Surge
abilities.effect: Set your Balance to 0. Cannot be used while at Positive Balance.

abilities.name: Last Guard
abilities.effect: Gain +2 Defense Value against the next Interrupt attempt this round.
